Professional ANPR Features

Everything you need for automatic number plate recognition, delivered as a service with enterprise-grade reliability and ease of use.

Recognition As A Service

Unlimited File Uploads

Upload an unlimited number of files containing video footage or photos for processing.

Any Video Format

Process video footage of any length in the required format with high accuracy recognition.

Downloadable CSV Results

Get all captured number plates in a structured, downloadable CSV file format.

Access from Anywhere

Web Access

Access MicroANPR from any Internet-connected computer with just a web browser.

Mobile Compatible

Use MicroANPR on any mobile device with full functionality and responsive design.

Privacy Focused

Only public data (licence plates) is collected, logged and converted to CSV.

Technical Specifications

Detailed specifications and requirements for MicroANPR service to ensure optimal performance and compatibility with your needs.

Supported File Types

Video Formats
MP4, AVI, MOV, WMV, FLV
Image Formats
JPEG, PNG, TIFF, BMP
File Size Limit
Unlimited
Video Length
Any duration

Platform Compatibility

Web Browsers
Chrome, Firefox, Safari, Edge
Mobile Devices
iOS, Android compatible
Operating Systems
Windows, macOS, Linux
Internet Required
Broadband connection recommended

Processing & Output

Recognition Accuracy
High precision AI algorithms
Output Format
CSV with timestamps & coordinates
Processing Time
Depends on file size & complexity
Data Privacy
Only license plates captured

Advanced Features & Capabilities

MicroANPR leverages cutting-edge technology to deliver reliable, accurate, and scalable automatic number plate recognition services.

Recognition Technology

Advanced AI-powered optical character recognition specifically optimized for license plates

Multi-Language Support

Supports license plates from multiple countries and regions with different formats

Batch Processing

Process multiple files simultaneously for increased efficiency and throughput

Cloud Infrastructure

Scalable cloud-based processing ensures consistent performance and availability

Secure Processing

All uploads are processed securely with data encryption and privacy protection

API Integration

RESTful API available for developers to integrate ANPR into custom applications

System Requirements

For optimal performance, we recommend a stable broadband internet connection and a modern web browser. Processing times may vary based on file size, video length, and complexity of the footage.
